name: messenger-simulator
description: Ứng dụng mô phỏng nhắn tin và gọi điện với cấu hình IP

scripts.start: echo Starting Messenger Simulator... && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" --names "SERVER,CLIENT,ELECTRON" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client" "npm run start:electron"
scripts.dev: echo Starting development mode (web only)... && concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold" --prefix "[SERVER]" --prefix "[CLIENT]" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:client"
scripts.build: echo Building client... && cd client && npm run build
scripts.build:electron: echo Building electron app... && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.clean:
echo Cleaning node_modules... && rmdir /s /q node_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q server
ode_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q client
ode_modules 2>nul & rmdir /s /q electron
ode_modules 2>nul & echo Clean completed.
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all
scripts.health: echo Checking application health... && node -e "console.log('Node.js version:', process.version)" && npm --version && echo Health check completed.
scripts.logs: echo Opening logs... && start cmd /k "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.test: echo Running tests... && cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test

author: HTTT Project
